page.title: 06Tidwell Farm Landscove
page.content: Mr.Savage farms this 396 acres of land with 4 farm workers.There are 240 {cattle},130 dairy cows and the rest calves ,heifers and bullocks.There are about 30 sheep and 15 chickens.The {cows}produce 400,000 litres of milk each year. Some 60 cattle are sold including about 20 cows.One hundred and ten acres are sown with{barley}and 40 acres with wheat,150 tons of grain is stored for animal feed and some 200 to 250 tons is sold. The milk is sold to the Unigate Dairies.Sheeps wool is sent to the wool mills at Buckfastleigh,45 tons of apples are sold to Hills Cider. Mr.Savage enjoys{farming}and the annual battle against the seasons and the outdoor life and the fact that he never has two days the same.His father worked the farm before him and he feels his roots are in the farm.
